    • Constructor Detail

      • Notification

        public Notification(int ID!,
int height!,
int width!,
java.lang.String text!,
int dismiss!,
int x!,
int y!,
java.lang.String title!,
NotificationManager super!,
java.lang.String textTitle!,
java.lang.Boolean animate!,
java.lang.String EventHandle!,
BBjColor background!,
BBjImage image!,
java.util.ArrayList buttons!,
java.lang.String link!)
        Initializing a Notification
        Parameters:
        ID! - ID of the Notification within the context
        height! - height of the Notification
        width! - width of the Notification
        text! - text displayed on the Notification body
        dismiss! - time in seconds until Notification will be dismissed
        x! - x Position of the Notification
        y! - y Position of the Notification
        title! - title of the window the Notification is displayed in
        super! - reference to superclass (aka the Manager Managing the Notifications)
        textTitle! - title displayed on the Notification body
        animate! - animation Mode toggle
        EventHandle! - handle to be thrown when the window itself was clicked
        background! - BackgroundColor of the Window
        image! - Icon to be displayed on the left hand side of the Notification
        buttons! - Metadata of the buttons that will be put on the Notification
        link! - link that the redirectbutton will redirect you to

        y! - new y position of the Notification
        animation! - animationmode-toggle

        public java.lang.Boolean validateURL()
        check if an URL is valid to launch for the redirect Button
        Returns:
        returns if the URL that is given to the Window is valid or not

      • dismiss

        public void dismiss(java.lang.Boolean animate!)
        dismiss the window itself Caution! will not delete any other traces of the notification
        Parameters:
        animate! - animationmode-toggle
